Reviews.Title: Good accessories, TERRIBLE case quality
Reviews.Author: Harma
Reviews.Content: I bought this kit to go along with my new Nikon D3100 and thought that I would get a lot for the price.  Essentially I did, and I love the accessories.  The bag, however, is TERRIBLY made.  I am so upset with the quality of this bag.  There were strings hanging loose everywhere, one of the zippers were bent and it does not seem to be sturdy in the least bit.  The interior is made with a thin lining of fabric, where you can see the styrofoam underneath.  STYROFOAM.  That's about as cheap as it can get for a bag.  I'm only keeping it because I don't want to return the accessories.  Though I'll probably toss this one out and get a new one.  So disappointed.  Might as well buy each of these things individually and get the case elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Essentials Accessory Bundle Kit for  my Nikon D3100
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Great deal for the price!  Check out many others and I found this to be the best deal for what I needed

Reviews.Title: nikon kit
Reviews.Author: nikonlizzie
Reviews.Content: I had a great experience with this purchase. The kit was shipped out to me in a shorter perod than expected!! The qulity of the products were superb. Have since bought more products.

Reviews.Title: Great product.. good accessories.
Reviews.Author: Ram
Reviews.Content: a very useful product to store and expand your photographic experience.. the accessories help me clean and maintain my camera in a very good manner.. 5 stars for sure

Reviews.Title: value for money
Reviews.Author: vikas
Reviews.Content: good overall combination product.value for money, will suggest to buy from amazon n there partner as in store prices were twice as here
